DOC.brief_title: The Effect Administering Small Dose Glucose During Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: Rapid infusion large amount glucose associate fetal hyperglycemia , hyperinsulinemia , neonatal hypoglycemia . However , effect small dose glucose unclear . We conduct pilot study small dose glucose . We investigate effect glucose-containing fluid blood sugar umbilical artery . We find case no-glucose-containing fluid , case umbilical arterial concentration glucose less 50 mg/dl , might cause neonatal hypoglycemia . In addition , case 1 % -glucose-containing fluid , mean umbilical arterial concentration glucose 97 mg/dl . The purpose study investigate effect administer small dose glucose pregnant woman neonate cesarean section . We investigate safety efficacy use glucose-containing solution pregnant woman neonate .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing cesarean section meet criterion American Society Anesthesiologists physical status 12 ASA physical status > =3 , Obesity ( BMI > 35 ) , Height > =175cm , Weight > =80Kg
